thumb.title: ファイアーエムブレム覚醒最短攻略32ターン
thumb.description: 英語のルール:Rules: 1. Normal Classic Mode. 2. All Renown items, Spotpass shops and units are allowed. 3. DLC is banned. 4. Skirmishes are banned. 5. Logbook units are banned. 6. Anna shops and Barracks are banned. 7. No sparking tiles if possible, but sometimes it cannot be avoided. In that case, any item received from one will be discarded. 8. All maps, including Paralogues, cost turns.
